```{r setup, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(us.geonames)

src <- "~/Downloads/five_year_review"
fils <- list.files(src, full.names = TRUE, recursive = TRUE)

terms <- c(
  "(possibly|probably|is|likely|may be) extinct",
  "no( known)* individuals",
  "no (populations|individuals)( are)* known"
)
```

```{r proc, echo = FALSE}
proc_file <- function(f) {
  text <- get_text(f)
  mats <- list("character", length(terms))
  for(i in 1:length(terms)) {
    mats[[i]] <- str_match_all()
  }
}
```
